author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
Hearken, ye folk, to the tale of this time,
Of the Biden kin, who their fair taxes climb!
With gold and coin, some one hundred-seventh score,
In the year of our Lord, two thousand twenty and four.

Onward I sing, of the Russian might,
Sergei Lavrov, the sage, in Latin lands takes flight;
To Brazil he traveled, a tale of war he sought to quell,
Then to lands of Venezuela, Nicaragua, and Cuba he dwells.

Lo and behold, the young vikings strive,
The labor market's rough seas, they must contrive;
Futures uncertain, the land abounds with dread,
A new generation's saga, for employment to be wed.

feedItems.title: Bidens Paid About $170,000 in Taxes for 2022
feedItems.description: The first couple reported $579,514 in adjusted gross income, slightly less than 2021.

feedItems.title: Russian Foreign Minister Seeks Deeper Ties in Latin America
feedItems.description: In a visit to the region, Sergei Lavrov thanked Brazil for its proposal to end the Ukraine war before flying to Venezuela, Nicaragua and Cuba.

feedItems.title: Gen Z Faces a Tough Labor Market
feedItems.description: College students discuss their employment opportunities and job hunting.

author.name: Conchobar mac Nessa
author.description: An Irish bard who doth sing of the battles and triumphs of his people, preserving their traditions and history.

newsMedieval:
Of laws and lawmakers I shall sing,
In Erin's land their voices ring,
From China's Xinjiang, import stout,
Against forced labor laws cry out.

A tale of Julie Su I glean,
As Biden's Labor nominee keen,
With fierce union's interest in heart,
She fights for workers, plays her part.

And now my song to Trump doth soar,
With Disney by his side, he swore,
Against great DeSantis, in the fray,
'Woke' tempest rises, holds its sway.

feedItems.title: Lawmakers Look for Tough Implementation of Forced Labor Law Targeting China
feedItems.description: U.S. lawmakers scrutinized possible loopholes in an anti-forced labor law blocking many imports from China’s Xinjiang region, expressing bipartisan support for cracking down on companies with supply chains stemming from the region.

feedItems.title: A Big Labor Partisan Named Julie Su
feedItems.description: Biden’s Labor nominee puts union interests above workers.

feedItems.title: Donald Trump Sides With Disney
feedItems.description: The former President goes for woke to trash Ron DeSantis.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A troubadour from Occitania who doth compose songs of love and chivalry, enchanting all who hear her voice.

newsMedieval:
In Aprile's month of nineteen and twenty-three,
Unraveling errors, corrections to be,
A manuscript's tale of veracity free,
In the garb of Amplification dons, we see.

Neath Diamond's resplendent field of play,
Four noble clubs their grievance shalt say,
Thee an unpaid feast dost partake each day,
As they cheers and chants, do mask the fray.

Seek I then to tell of auction most flawed,
FDIC with craft, the fate of the SVB gnawed,
Nonbank bidders' plight a burden unthawed,
And cost to ye commoners' hearts thus clawed.

feedItems.title: Corrections & Amplifications
feedItems.description: Corrections & Amplifications for the edition of April 19, 2023.

feedItems.title: Pro Take: Diamond Sports Should Be Stripped of 'Free Lunch', MLB Clubs Say
feedItems.description: Diamond Sports Group will face off Wednesday with Major League Baseball and four of its teams, which say it has been eating a “free lunch” in chapter 11 by broadcasting games without paying for the exclusive rights.

feedItems.title: How the FDIC Rigged the SVB Auction
feedItems.description: The agency snubbed nonbank bidders, which cost taxpayers more.
